channel.title: Need help with auto cache - trisidia x based client
channel.description: Hey there, i trying to make an rsps for a school assignment, and have seem to have luck thus far, but am having difficulty setting up my auto cache. I have zipped my cache into a zip file, and uploaded to dropbox. I then put that link in what i believe to be the appropriate spots in my cachedownloader, client, and gui.java. I as well changed my signlink to the right location. I have uploaded my client folder, as well as my cache zip file to dropbox. If anyone could help me i would appreciate it. Please ignore the nooby server name lol cache - https://www.dropbox.com/s/di29bnmkzxgc6tu/BrandonScape.zip?dl=0 client - https://www.dropbox.com/s/5301u0yz4ufdlpw/Xenon%20Client.rar?dl=0

item.title: Need help with auto cache - trisidia x based client
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

You have the Link posted like this: cache - https://www.dropbox.com/s/di29bnmkzxgc6tu/BrandonScape.zip?dl=0

Change it to like this: cache - https://dl.dropbox.com/s/di29bnmkzxgc6tu/BrandonScape.zip

dl instead of www and at the end cut off the: ?dl=0

Should work. I hope so.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with auto cache - trisidia x based client

item.title: Need help with auto cache - trisidia x based client
item.dc:creator: @mabmab40 mabmab40
item.description:
@mabmab40 wrote:

Hey there, i trying to make an rsps for a school assignment, and have seem to have luck thus far, but am having difficulty setting up my auto cache. I have zipped my cache into a zip file, and uploaded to dropbox. I then put that link in what i believe to be the appropriate spots in my cachedownloader, client, and gui.java. I as well changed my signlink to the right location. I have uploaded my client folder, as well as my cache zip file to dropbox. If anyone could help me i would appreciate it. Please ignore the nooby server name lol
cache - https://www.dropbox.com/s/di29bnmkzxgc6tu/BrandonScape.zip?dl=0
client - https://www.dropbox.com/s/5301u0yz4ufdlpw/Xenon%20Client.rar?dl=0
